properties.Name: Te Atamira - Stage
properties.Description: Fire shows, aerial performances, DJ and live music performed every night from 7pm to 9pm.

properties.Name: Tahurangi
properties.Description: Lighting up the back drop to the stage, the 3 large trees will illuminate the entrance to Cathedral Square.

properties.Name: Whakamaramatia te Pō
properties.Description: Magical projection onto the old post office building clock tower bringing it to life.

properties.Name: Ngā Whetū, Ngā Manu - Matariki Lanterns
properties.Description: 10 Lanterns representing all 10 stars visible in the South Island as part of the Matariki Constellation.

properties.Name: Te Ataata
properties.Description: Lighting up the trees with an amazing coloured lighting display making the Old Post Office glow with colour.

properties.Name: Kaihōpara o Ngā Pūtaiao - Otago Museum - Bringing the light
properties.Description: Laser, lenses, luminous chemicals and more. Get hands-on with the science of light. Operating out of a container in Cathedral Square - Final weekend only

properties.Name: Tīrama Mai
properties.Description: Tīrama Mai.

properties.Name: Tīrama Mai
properties.Description: Tīrama Mai Star.

properties.Name: Mitre 10: Ngā Kōrero Pakiwaitara - Matariki Storytelling fire pit
properties.Description: Come and enjoy the heat around the firepit and listen to live and recorded stories about Matariki.

properties.Name: Te Pīatata o te Papa
properties.Description: Magical Lights in and above the grasses pulsing and glowing creating movement in the amazing light show.

properties.Name: Muramura te Mahara
properties.Description: Telling the origin story of Matariki within a stunning light and sound full immersion experience.

properties.Name: Kia Tūrama - Light fantastic
properties.Description: Amazing light show bringing to life this old Christchurch landmark, the old Rydges carpark.

properties.Name: Te Karu Whātata - Star Snapshot
properties.Description: Look through the telescope to see the Matariki constellation.

properties.Name: Ngā Kapowai
properties.Description: Huge Dragonflies and reeds showing the connection between the stars and nature.

properties.Name: Matariki
properties.Description: Be amazed by this 3D animation of our Matariki Character, check out our panels to read the full story.

properties.Name: Kaihōpara o Te Tiri o Te Moana - Antarctic New Zealand Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Explore the Antarctic, with amazing footage supplied by Anthony Powel. Come find out more about our amazing connection to Antarctica.

properties.Name: Te Whenua Tūrama - Field of Lights
properties.Description: Stunning installation in the shape of a koru pulsing colour and sound.

properties.Name: Te Tāpatu o te Mārama - Interactive Drum and Lights
properties.Description: Interactive drum and lights.

properties.Name: Te Poi o te Mārama
properties.Description: Ball of light, refracting colour and light.

properties.Name: Te Turama o ngā Rākau
properties.Description: Lighting the Avon river trees, creating a stunning back drop to the riverside setting of the festival.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki - Ka Tīaho, Ka Tūmanako - Cubes
properties.Description: Our fantastic cubes are back and situated throughout the festival zone.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki - Ka Tīaho, Ka Tūmanako - Cubes

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and grab yourself something to eat and drink at Riverside.

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and check out the amazing art on offer at The Arts Centre.

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and grab yourself an ice cream or check out one of the restuarants at New Regant Street.
